name: Mutual current account
text:
In all actions in the nature of debt, account, or assumpsit, brought to recover any balance due upon a mutual, open, and current account, the cause of action shall be deemed to have accrued from the time of the last item proved in the account. [CC 1859, §1038; RL 1925, §2640; RL 1935, §3911; RL 1945, §10422; RL 1955, §241-2; HRS ; am L 1972, c 105, §1(b)]
Case Notes
  Cited:  14 H. 495; 20 H. 433, 443; 33 H. 876, 881.
